website_summaries.verdict: You can’t beat this set of transmitters and receivers, perfect for those who are looking to set up doorbells at multiple entryways.
pros: Doorbell system and receivers communicate long distances
Comes with 2 receivers and 2 waterproof transmitter buttons for separate doors
Outdoor pieces stand up to extreme weather
cons: Pairing 2 separate rings takes a bit of time and patience

customer_reviews.title: Great solution to several problems I've had with getting door bells put up.
customer_reviews.text: Finally I have doorbells front and back !!!!!!! And I put them up myself. The man bought a wireless doorbell years ago and then lost it before he ever got it installed. These were easy, their system has kept them in place all year and you get a selection of sounds so it is easy to tell which door someone is at. It's also very helpful to be able to easily install the button anywhere on the porch as the wireless communication leaves plenty of room to work with. Now I can put the button where they can reach it without opening the gate at the rear entry. Delivery people avoid becoming food for the dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel B. Rine

customer_reviews.title: Poor design, poor quality, poor customer support.
customer_reviews.text: One of the receivers stopped working 1 day after I installed this. Their customer support is pretty much non-existent- you can only leave a message by phone and the reply I got from their email customer support was gibberish. Also, you have to dismantle the transmitter buttons to change the batteries. I would like to give this a -5.
customer_reviews.author: Biff

customer_reviews.title: This stopped working after three months!
customer_reviews.text: The door bell system seemed ok, bit of a gimmick with 52 ring tones, I set it up for different tones from the two entry doors, nice concept, poor delivery. I opened a ticket to address the issue of the non working unit, which was closed without resolution and the company stopped replying to my emails. I'm now looking for a replacement doorbell, I wouldn't go with this company again nor would I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Terry C

customer_reviews.title: Hopeful
customer_reviews.text: Just set these up and seem to work well. Interestingly, if you register on line, you get one free accessory while supplies last. I registered and the only product I was eligible for was double sided tape. I was then told my Amazon purchase didn’t make me eligible! I was offered a 10% coupon if I purchased from Sadotech directly. I am to have a 2 year warranty...hope I don’t need it!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Only had it for a couple of days so far but it couldn’t have been easy to “install” but really you just plug it in the wall. Ready to go right out of the box. Just a couple of screws to install the doorbell unless you use the sticky pad that comes with it but I wanted it to be permanent so I used the screws. (Also included) comes with a baby screwdriver as well. Pairing is easy just scroll through until you hear the tone you like, hold the volume button down for 3-5 seconds. You’ll hear a tone and see the led flashing, you now have 5 seconds to push the doorbell and that’s it!
customer_reviews.author: SmallsByGucci

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: I like the doorbells and the wide selection of ring tones. The exterior buttons look good on the door frame and the mounting screws hold them firmly 8n plaace. I have one ringer inside my home and the other in the garage. When I ordered them I thought that I could assign a ringtone for the back door and a different tone for the front door...but I haven’t be3n able to figure out how to do that. That’s why I didn’t give five stars on the installation rating. And to m6 knowledge these doorbells do not have a motion detector. So I left that line empty. If they have this capability, will someone tell me how to enable it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited by all of the reviews and bought this product. I did drag my feet to install it but found it super simple to install this. Within a week, it stopped working!! There is a blue light on the transmitter but nothing coming out of the receivers. I'm totally disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: H. Pierre

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long.
customer_reviews.text: Within just a few months despite being in a protected area moisture penetrated the ringer button and we started hearing the bell ring at all hours of the day and night. Cannot recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret G Cline

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product in the beginning. however now the ringer just goes off at random times. Like in the middle of a night which is not good!! I have not been able to get the seller to respond to any of my emails.. I would like a refund on this defective item
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: screws to old buttons same holes
customer_reviews.text: Such a small package arrived. very compact size. very nicely made. Easy to set one button to a different ring for back door front door distinction. I plugged both chimes into a power strip on the kitchen table for convenience. Just scroll thru the chimes tones till you find the one you like. then hold its volume button for 5 seconds till the light starts blinking. then press the doorbell button to set. repeat for the second chime. comes with double stick and screws for buttons. the screws aligned with the old button screws. nice and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Summon your employees
customer_reviews.text: I got these for work. I have a button in the office and an alarm in the warehouse. I wanted my boss to be able to summon us to the office without having to walk out there every time! I also have a button in the warehouse and an alarm in the office so we can call her as well. Really is great! Initially wanted it to be for customers to press if no one is in the office, but they rarely see the button and note I put on it so...
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Simple to install and versatile; instructions not always clear
customer_reviews.text: Needed a back doorbell for our apartment in a century old Chicago 2 flat and this one was highly rated by reviewers. Truly plug-n-play: batteries already installed in button, ringer just plugs into outlet, worked fine without any fancy programming. Pretty simple to raise/lower volume or change tone at any time and it’s easy to add mire buttons or ringers in the future. Written and online instructions aren’t completely clear so take your own notes or ask seller for help. Mount makes it easy to slide off the button when it’s time for a new battery.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Michael

customer_reviews.title: Randomly goes off!
customer_reviews.text: This thing will just randomly go off from time to time. Drives me crazy when it goes off in the middle of the night, seems to happen very often.
customer_reviews.author: dustin

customer_reviews.title: Best option out there for a doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this new doorbell. I bought the one with the 2 receivers so it can amplify throughout the whole house. They are very loud. I mounted the transmitter using the double-sided tape which is very strong by the way. I refuse to drill anything to the walls unless I really have to and this allowing me to avoid that. I would highly recommend this product. Instructions are very small in print and I needed to snap a photo and enlarge on my phone...lol. Read carefully before getting frustrated. It can be confusing if you don't pay attention.
customer_reviews.author: MIAMIviaQUEENSNY

customer_reviews.title: Only one receiver works - Customer service
customer_reviews.text: Update: I contacted Sado and they were willing to replace the receiver (with a bit of negotiating on shipping cost). I've had the new receiver for a day or so now and it hasn't had any of the issues the previous one did. One of my receivers just keeps making noise. I've tried to reset it but every few minutes it rings.
customer_reviews.author: CJF

customer_reviews.title: pretty good ...missing three features
customer_reviews.text: overall a good unit loud enough and lots of tunes easy install and I had no problem with pariing...but I would look for a unit that was at least this good plus 1 a smaller personal wrist or lanyard attached transmitter. (for use as an internal home alarm (sick and elderly) 2) while this had many tunes /jingles, I need an ALARM tune... like the European siren 3) BATTERY maintenance could be easier - this requires some disassembly /reassembly
customer_reviews.author: The Critic

customer_reviews.title: Genius solution
customer_reviews.text: A must IN a large house! Took the idea from another buyers review and used them INSIDE my house. Best idea ever! I bought the 2 pack and put one in the ‘mancave’ / teen hangout downstairs and the other in the garage. The ring gets their attention even over gaming systems or sports on tv or whatever tools he’s operating without having to shout. Or actually go find them... At first the guys were annoyed at the idea of them but once we started using them they admit it’s actually much better than shouting or invading their electronic sanctuary.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Pretty easy to link together
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to link together. Looks really cool in person. A lot smaller then I thought it was going to be so the receivers are easy to hide if you want. I linked one transmitter for the back door to both receivers and the other to the front door and each has a different ring tone. Put one in the basement and the other on the main floor. In reality the hardest part was remembering which tone was which when I set it up. The speakers are very loud. Not over kill loud but loud enough to hear all threw out the house. Great product for the price would totally recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Should last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: Battery location is not the best but it works. Just don't loose the screws. Button is much sturdier (than my last Sedo I owned) due to battery location so I don't mind the location too much. Disappointed the tune "Hey Jude" is missing from the line up of tunes. The product seam like it will last a long time and I'm happy with it. The slimmer button is better than the wider one. Everything came in great condition and was sent on time as expected. I would recommend the seller and product over cheaper models.
customer_reviews.author: shashee

customer_reviews.title: great when it works correctly
customer_reviews.text: The back doorbell has started ringing on its own. So much for "waterproof"...we've had rain on and off for a few weeks and the inside of the unit has condensation which is causing it to ring by itself. The doorbell button doesn't sit in the rain and is covered by the eaves of the house so it's not like it gets doused when it rains. We dried the moisture out and it helped for a few days but it's doing it again. Oh well.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: This doorbell system works great for us
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a simple/cost effective solution to cover our exterior office door (after hours) and interior lobby for guest during business hours. We have a part time receptionist and our interior doors have an electronic pass card for entry. This doorbell system works great for us! With a transmitter button exterior and interior we are always covered. The two chimes work well and have more ring tone options than needed. The chime farthest from the actual transmitter is approximately 120 feet away and receives the signal without issue. This is also traveling through three glass and metal framed window areas in our lobby, metal framed studs and drywall, and a concrete block wall. Very pleased with the product!
customer_reviews.author: Griffin13

customer_reviews.title: Notice battery type  (Never mind it is NOT the batteries!) See my update.
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't find a battery name. It is a cheap 23A 12V. Both unit batteries lasted about a week and woke me up at 3:00AM and again at 4:00AM the same morning. (I am assuming it is the batteries) Being a battery I have never personally used, I am ordering new ones. Other features are ok. Just a little ticked right now. UPDATE...........I purchased new Energizer batteries and installed them. Now that it is past time to be able to return them, it happened again at 4:00AM and again at 6:30 AM. I DO NOT recommend this item based on my personal experience. Purchasing batteries only made this item more expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Mello

customer_reviews.title: Does an ok job
customer_reviews.text: Works fine so far. Have had them about 2 months. I am disappointed that I cannot actually program for two different sounds as indicated in the description. I have one outside and one inside that summons my sleepy family member so I don't have to shout for him. We programmed the inside one for him differently than the one for our doorbell. Yet, he hears both the inside and outside tones when we ring for him. Not a big enough deal to send back, but one reason I chose this brand was because of supposedly being able to have different rings depending on which transmitter is used.
customer_reviews.author: notesofjubilee

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: My new doorbell is working just fine. It was easy to install, directions were clear, and there were many choices of possible rings. It arrived in perfect condition and I like the fact that it is expandable, just in case I want to add another receiver. I also like the easy way the doorbell attached to my house. It clips onto a backing that I screwed into the wood. If I want to change the sound or the battery, I will have no problem lifting it up and off. All in all, a good choice for me and a good recommendation for you!
customer_reviews.author: Linda P.

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased
customer_reviews.text: My home is on two levels, not extremely large, but having two doors and only one door chime just did not cut it. When I read of the Sado expandable door chime system, I decided to try it. Set up was very easy, if you read the entire instructions. One chime in upper level, one chime in lower level, and they worked perfectly. Still wanting just a little more sound, I immediately ordered 2 more receivers. Distance does not seem to be a problem, and the front door chime transmitter is located on a brick wall; steel door, and the lower receiver immediately responds when activated. I may even order two more!!!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Weisling

customer_reviews.title: Must have,  no brainer
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install. Pulled off the dead (no power) button on the wall, and this puppy screwed into the existing holes of my builder installed door bell button! It comes with 3m tape to mount if needed, but I wanted in original location. The set up to set one of the 50 something tones got confusing, so I had to break out the instructions. After that a breeze.... so bottom line, I am happy with it. Glad I got it.... kinda nice to change the ringer to holiday tone on Christmas! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ben B.

customer_reviews.title: Phantom rings
customer_reviews.text: Have had the product a little over a month. And have started to get these phantom rings. Usually during bad weather. The doorbell will go off 6 or 7 times and random intervals. Originally i have thought it was kids being kids but seems to become more and more common.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: very nice doorbell
customer_reviews.text: Overall like the way the bell works. Installing the transmitter was tricky... the holes for the screws are not drilled through. Screws provided too flimsy to screw through the plastic. Had to buy sturdier screws & drill holes through. Once installed, works great. Tone is wonderful - clear and can be heard even in basement. Would buy again Customer Service is FABULOUS ... they responded to my queries within hours & provided helpful video & manual
customer_reviews.author: Catherine A. Crep

customer_reviews.title: This works great. Been using it for about six months.
customer_reviews.text: This works great so far for us. We’ve been using this for about six months. We have one ringer upstairs (on the second floor) and one downstairs (at ground level). It’s plenty loud enough. The signal from both first floor doorbells reaches both ringers (through our 100+ year old thick walls and floors). This saved us a lot of trouble and money versus installing a new hard wired system. We just simply set it up on the default settings and it’s worked out fine. Based on our experience, I would recommend this wire-free doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Felix D.

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it. You'll thank me later.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Install took less than 15 minutes (mounting both transmitters, one at front door and the other at side gate). One receiver in the main house & the other was plugged into our rear separated guest house. Range is no issue, and volume is quite loud easily heard anywhere on my property at its loudest setting. Set the side gate as one tone & the front door as a different tone. Both transmitters trigger both receivers, but now I know if its the side gate (solid wood) or front door being triggered. Ordered on Saturday & it was delivered Sunday (Prime)! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly K

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect, easy install. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: These doorbells look really nice and are perfect for what we needed. We have one door to two houses, so we labeled whose is whose so people can ring for the right person. It was very easy to install and really convenient that it came with the needed batteries already inside. We’ve only had it about a month, but so far I have zero complaints! There are multiple chimes to choose from, with plenty of musical ones and also plenty that are variations on the typical “ding-dong.” I do like the adjustable volume; the low setting is pretty quiet and the loudest setting is very loud, with two additional settings in between.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Rae Cousineau

customer_reviews.title: Simple, great working doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: The setup of this doorbell was insanely easy. It's pretty much ready to go once you take it out of the box, you just have to change the ring sound and volume if you want to. We set the back doorbell to have a different ring from the front so that we know which door to go to. Since not very many people go to the back door, I put that one on a fun ring ;). I really like that this set comes with two ringers and two receivers. I'm very happy with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joy W

customer_reviews.title: Awesome performance at an awesome price.
customer_reviews.text: What a simple to use and set up product. Doorbell remotes were already paired to the 2 chime boxes upon opening. The package has everything you will need to install this product. Remote chime volume can be changed easily and the range is amazing. We put ours in our 10,000 sq/ft warehouse and there is no issue with range at all. Also purchased a door open chime to this set and the pairing of it was a breeze. Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.author: Honor

customer_reviews.title: Nice doorbell!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this a few months ago. We moved into a new house. The house is an older home that has been fully updated but was missing a door bell. I wanted to have two buttons (1 for front door, 1 for back) and 2 chimers (1 downstairs, 1 upstairs). I was worried because the house is big and I didn't know if the range would work. However, it works great and the volume and chime can be adjusted. This was a great buy and I love it! I would recommend this product to any of my friends or family!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Water resistant but definitely not water proof
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product for my shop. East to install and worked very well until the first rain. The transmitter button I installed on the front door didn't make it through the storm. The blue light comes on when the button is pushed but the transmitter feature no longer works. The second button I installed on my shop's back door works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Lover

customer_reviews.title: Didn't disappoint
customer_reviews.text: I needed a doorbell for my gate since our driveway is a little bit far from my house. If someone is outside my gate, we wouldn't hear them unless my dogs bark. I wanted a wireless doorbell to avoid the hassle of installing wired one. This didn't disappoint. I know it says waterproof and for outdoor use but we still install it with a covering to protect it from rain and harsh sunlight. So far so good. We haven't change the battery since we installed the transmitter. Worth the price. Hassle-free installation.
customer_reviews.author: Jeng

customer_reviews.title: Great for our needs!
customer_reviews.text: When searching for door bells we wanted something water resistant and that we can program a seperate chime per door. In our home we have a front door and a side door that we mainly use that are across the housr from each other. We programed each door to a different tume so we know which door to go to. They worked perfectly. They have serveal volume and tone options! I cant wait to use the christmas songs this winter!
customer_reviews.author: OkieMomma

customer_reviews.title: Good deal!
customer_reviews.text: I like that each receiver plays 2 separate tones for the front door and back door. The one receiver in the shed plays 2 tones for front and rear doors, and the receiver in the house plays 2 completely different tones for the front and rear doors!!! The tone selection is huge and includes holiday, classical, birthday, etc. music. :)
customer_reviews.author: JudyG46

customer_reviews.title: Very good range, loud, works well.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good product. It has decent range, can be adjusted to be loud and works through brick wall and through floors. We use the system as a doorbell (current doorbell is too quiet) as well as a way for my elderly dad to signal when he needs assistance (he keeps on button with him at all times in the house). Purchased extra receivers, works perfectly. Only complaint now is that the back removable mounting plate is too easily removed, someone could easily walk away with our external doorbell if they wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Tennis4Ever

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is so easy to install! Just attach anywhere with either screws or adhesive strips. Both are included. Everything you need is included. No batteries to buy or install. It offers many options of chimes and songs to choose from, including Christmas songs and Happy Birthday. The volume is easy to adjust. It is also an attractive product. Very happy with this doorbells!
customer_reviews.author: gingersnap

customer_reviews.title: Fastest Addition To My House Ever
customer_reviews.text: This was stupid proof to setup. Because the way my previous dead doorbell was installed I had to use the 2-sided tape, but it seems like really good quality tape. I bet you could pressure wash the siding and the tape would still stick. It also came with a mounting plate but my siding wouldn't allow for that. I plugged it in, pushed the buttons on both doors and like magic it rings. I have a split level and the buttons are only 30 ft from each wall bell but it all works as advertised. Hope the battery life is OK on it.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good!
customer_reviews.text: Received the kit today and they were surprisingly easy to program. I have a transmitter at the front and at the back door and a receiver upstairs and one downstairs. I have Ding Dong at the front and Ding at the back, and both work on both receivers. I love that the buttons on the transmitters light up when pushed and the transmitters are the perfect size for placement by the doors. Hope the waterproofing works as advertised because both doors can get slammed with rain. Will update if something happens.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good product needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: Good product, exactly as expected. The instructions need to be improved. They were, apparently, written by someone whose first language was not English. Kudos for that effort, but I couldn't understand how to select a different chime and pair it with the transmitter so I'm just using the factory default. How much can it cost to hire a native English speaker to edit the instructions?
customer_reviews.author: Michele Defilippo

customer_reviews.title: Recommended!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money. They are loud so can actually hear it! Also love u can change the ringer and how many ring tone they are.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: This one works for me
customer_reviews.text: I've had trouble finding door bells that actually work and are water proof. These fit the bill. One door bell is protected from the rain, but the other one isn't, which causes a problem when it rains. Well as much rain as we have had this year, I haven't had any problem. Volume control is great and it is easy to change the tones.....now I just have to remember which tone goes with which door.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Plahn

customer_reviews.title: Unit seems to be a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased this unit initially to install for a neighbor down the block. It was easy to install and seemed like it was a good product. The folks liked the unit very much. I decided that I would get one and install it my own home, since we do have issues hearing the doorbell, depending on where we are at the time. So I have installed one in my own home and it seems to be well worth the effort and price.
customer_reviews.author: barry askew

customer_reviews.title: New Yawk
customer_reviews.text: I'm unfortunately not too happy with this product. I expected the doorbell to ring very loud, and it does not. It doesn't matter how much you adjust it, it's still not loud enough. Even with two receivers placed in the house not that far from the front door, it's still very poor quality sound. As far as being waterproof goes, I'll let you know. We may have another 'tropical storm' coming, and that will be the true test. I purchased a 'cheapy' wireless doorbell set up last year from Ace Hardware, and frankly, that was better. I don't like to be the bearer of bad news, but I think you should look elsewhere for a better quality item.
customer_reviews.author: New Yawk

customer_reviews.title: Great substitute for wired doorbell; crummy instruction booklet.
customer_reviews.text: When I was unable to successfully rewire a non-functioning wired doorbell I researched wireless devices and selected Crosspoint. The actual setup and install was simple including different rings fir different doors. Our home is masonry construction but that presented no problems concerning the range (location) of the doorbell transmitters and the ringing devices (receivers). My only minor complaint is it took a magnifying glass to read the installation instructions on the very tiny and poorly printed instruction booklet. C’mon guys - you could not have saved much by cheaping out on the printed instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Gary Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this doorbell because I'm disabled and I use them to get help if I need it. I have one in the main part of my house and the other one is in the back part of the house. My son hears it if I'm in the back and my husband hears the one in the front. I just push the button and I have the help I need. I'm sure it would work great as a doorbell too. I am very pleased. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Lancaster

customer_reviews.title: I am pleased with system
customer_reviews.text: I am pleased with system. Set up was easy as long as you followed the instructions to a "T". I paired both units to the same ring tone and put each one in a different part of the house. They are working just fine. Another reason I purchased this unit was because it came with a waterproof doorbell button. I live in a very windy area and my door door is exposed the the elements. I hope it keeps on working.
customer_reviews.author: junior

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Works! Came fast. As advertised. Easy to install and set up. Volume Adequate. Not to excited with sound choices. Was purchased to put one receiver in back yard @ 45 feet away from front door with 2 brick and 2 heavy plastered wall in between. Sooo expectations meet and spouse happy. No weatherproof star as no rain yet.
customer_reviews.author: esad

customer_reviews.title: great product, easy to program
customer_reviews.text: great product, easy to program, loud enough for larger building. Seller SW LLC has fantastic customer service, answering emails over weekend and providing replacement in 4 days (fir extra unit ordered that didn't meet expectations. No fuss just sent replacement very quickly and that unit was fine. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good but winter weather will tell if it is truely water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: Put on ring unit in the livingroom and one in the back of the house. So far so good. My problem is the front of the house faces east and all my previous wireless door bells would die after on winter. Time will tell. Update: I made it thru the winter and works just fine. Has a good tone. Only thing I wish is they would design it so it doesn't interfer with the second electrical plug. You can use it but it is a very tight fit. Over all this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: DogCat

customer_reviews.title: All the parts integrated nicely and work well
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this kit and two extra bell units and three extra buttons. All the parts integrated nicely and work well. Push any button and all the bells go off. I use them all inside for my handicapped wife. The bells are wall outlet plug-in with no battery which is great. Be aware that the bell will not work during a power failure if you are using it like I am. The buttons are battery operated with a screw on or supplied sticky strip. I would suggest getting the 3M velcro stickies instead of the supplied ones. I got mine at my super market's hardware section.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Nice wireless doorbell.
customer_reviews.text: Linking the several ones together and trying to separate one door ringer from another got a little hectic. We own a duplex...2 front doors, 2 rear doors...everything kept trying to operate all as one linked system...FYI.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: What's perfectly
customer_reviews.text: As soon as I received them the 1st thing I did was Install them, Let me tell you they work perfectly, i put them on my outside gates. So far I haven't had any issues with them. It was so easy to install them, and You have 2 choices, 1 by screws Or 2 double sided tape. I used the double sided tape and it works perfect. Cant believe how easy it was, Just plug it in and a few mins later your done. I think the hardest part was trying to figure out what charm you wanted for the doorbell.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Stanton

customer_reviews.title: Attractive, effective wireless doorbells
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, very easy to program and install, instructions very clear. Plenty of tone options. I selected two traditional tones that were nevertheless distinctly different for the front and back entries. With Happy Birthday, Christmas tunes and others, it would be easy to reprogram them temporarily for special occasions, if one wished. Volume options also excellent, although it would be difficult to imagine when one would use the softest, which is barely audible. The loudest can easily be heard throughout a 2500 sq ft house floor. Distance from both doorbells no problem for either receiver.
customer_reviews.author: David N. Orth

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I have had nothing but good things with this door bell. Sub zero temps to 120 degrees. Rain or shine. I also use them for my disabled father. I plug one of the alarms in my bedroom and he has the door bell and whenever he may be in an emergency and I am in my bedroom or the garage, or where ever I have the ringer plugged in, he can alert me. This is a wonderful addition to my household. Thank you for making this available.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan A Young

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Very easy to install/setup.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doorbell system. Easy to set up with lots of ringer choices and easy volume controls. I installed this in a house Museum where I work and assigned different ringtones for the front and back doors. I paired the doorbells with the door sensors so I know when someone enters when the doors are unlocked. If you want to change the tones you've selected just re-pair the units after selecting the new tone. Everything is so easy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Bernard T

customer_reviews.title: perfect for elderly Mom and caregiver
customer_reviews.text: I am absolutely shocked how well this solution works and how easy it was. I have looked for some kind of "call button" for my elderly Mom so I know when she needs me -- and one that I can hear when I'm on my porch as well. I have actually tried two other solutions and they were expensive and complicated and just did not serve the purpose. This simple "doorbell" receiver and transmitter worked right out of the box and is PERFECT for our use. And the price is under $40. Amazingly satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: missy

customer_reviews.title: Button gets stuck
customer_reviews.text: The customizable volumes and chime sounds for each unit are handy. Unfortunately the button gets stuck on the buzzer which rapidly depletes the battery, to where it lasted 6 months. As far as I can tell, replacing the battery isn't exactly simple either as you have to completely disassemble it, including removing the screwed in circuit board.
customer_reviews.author: Almohada

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is awsesome. Very easy to set up and get running. The remotes are sized so that I could use the same holes as my old doorbells and I like that I can easily slip off the remote from the base for battery replacement. Having the extra reciever allowed me to place one on each floor so i can always know if someone is at either door. I also liked the large selection of chimes and set mine up so that each door has its own chime.
customer_reviews.author: John Rascon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.text: This product was very easy to setup and use. It has 2 doorbells and 2 receivers. This worked out great as I use one doorbell for the front door and one for the back door with a different chime for each. The chimes go on separate floors. Previously, I couldn't hear any doorbell from upstairs. Now I not only hear them but I know which door the visitors are at. Especially nice in this time of working at home where the work at home office is nowhere near a door or doorbell. The only bad part, which isn't really a con, is trying to decide which chime to use out of more than 50 available.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Bissonnette

customer_reviews.title: Crosspoint Expandable Wireless Doorbell Alert
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for a doorbell that you could not hear in certain locations of the house. Easily installed. Never even tried extra ringtones, I just wanted to be able to hear doorbell in all locations. Really only needed one doorbell transmitter, using the second one for backup. Purchased an additional receiver and easily paired it with the system. Problem solved. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Renate

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. Bought these to put one on the front ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Bought these to put one on the front door and the other on the back door. I have plaster walls in my home which are thick and they didn't interfere with the signal. Instructions are simple to follow but I didn't need them since they worked right out of the box! Install is simple, you can either use the provided double-sided tape or the screws. I do think the screws should be made of a harder type of stainless steel as the ones provided tend to strip easily. All in all, very satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Q

customer_reviews.title: Solid product. Mildly annoying to set up.
customer_reviews.text: It's nice to see that wireless doorbells have finally stopped being essentially unchanged since the late 70s, because they were awful. These are not, and they support multi button, multi chime installation just fine. Downside is way too many chimes. I suggest when setting up to have all receivers plugged in close by and to do them all at once to each button, then move the receivers to their installed locations.
customer_reviews.author: Matt D

customer_reviews.title: Works Great and is an easy set up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because my wife and I were having problems hearing our built in door bell. So far this has exceeded our expectations. I blanked off the old doorbell button and replaced it with the one from this unit.The volume can be turned up and heard all over our house and the selection of available chimes and music is great. I even added a doorbell for the side door of our house where the neighbors usually come over with a separate ring. Set up is extremely easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Leigh

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: It rings on its own. No one would be at the door, and the door bell will rings on its own. I can't return it. Not recommend buying this. Seller said they would send a replacement, but they never did.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Compact Unit
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little door chime. I gave it 4 stars due to the volume not being as high as the old wired unit, but it is extremely versatile in location use as well as size. I do recommend this for use in even a rather large home. Mine is roughly 3300 sq ft, and it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and setup
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with ease of installing doorbell buttons and ease of pairing with receivers. The hardest part was making sure I had the same ringtone on both receivers. One receiver went in our basement and I was a little concerned that it wouldn't get the signal from the buttons but there was no problem at all. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Gail

customer_reviews.title: Easy transition
customer_reviews.text: I had an existing wired doorbell setup at 2 locations (front and back doors). It had stopped working and I wasn't sure what the specific problem was. It was much easier to buy this system and replace it than figuring it out. All I had to do was take off the old doorbells, tape the old wires, and place the new wireless doorbells where the old ones had been. Then, plug in the chimes and we were good to go. We put one chime on the main floor and one in the basement and can hear it wherever we are. This worked out very well and was incredibly easy to do. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says, does it well, easy to install. Simple, not tech, just works!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a simple alert, I received a product that does that and pleasantly. It is well packaged, quickly delivered, and doesn't take up any space. It required no tech professional to install. Perfect for simple needs. No camera, no wiring, just "plug and play".
customer_reviews.author: LATITUDES

customer_reviews.title: GREAT WIRELESS DOORBELL CHIME
customer_reviews.text: We needed a wireless doorbell chime with two receivers since we have a two story house. I am glad that this product is expandable, if we decide to put a receiver out in the backyard, we will be able to purchase an additional one. This product was so easy to install and we had a wireless doorbell within 3 minutes!!!! If you had a locked gate and needed a wireless doorbell, this would be perfect! I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: nettie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This wireless doorbell is working very good for us. At this time we are only using one transmitter and two receivers. The transmitter is mounted outside on vinyl siding near a metal storm door. Of the two receivers one is mounted about 15ft away and the other is about 60 feet. The house is 100 years old and has a lot of wood sheathing on it under the vinyl siding we put on it. I have no qualms recommending this product at this time.
customer_reviews.author: LockHerUp

customer_reviews.title: Great Plugin Doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This is a great doorbell system, it is wireless and very easy to install. Plus there is multiple different sound that can to selected. I would highly recommend SadoTech System. There customer service is also great to deal with if you have a concern.
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM

customer_reviews.title: Finally a long distance doorbell
customer_reviews.text: This is the first remote doorbell that actually works. Our house is 90 feet from the road, and the bell/receive is plugged into a kitchen outlet located an additional 20 feet inside the home. The signal has to go a total of approximately 110 feet, which includes passing through a concrete outer wall, and an inside plaster wall. I have had absolutely no false rings.
customer_reviews.author: zoolane

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install, 2 bells for convenience
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell is quite easy to install and configure. I've had it now for about 3 months, and had no issues whatsoever. Having 2 bells on one button is nice so we can hear it ring wherever we are in the house. There are lots of tunes available, so I look forward to the holidays when I can annoy my family by setting it to one of several appropriately themed tunes. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Works Great So Far!
customer_reviews.text: Works great so far! I purchased a wireless door bell set some time ago and but the frequency matched that of my neighbor's across the street so, every time someone rang her doorbell, it would ring at my house too! Naturally, that turned me off to wireless door bells for a while. But I decided to try it once more with Crosspoint. It arrived quickly and I went to my "Youtube library" and found a short video to learn how to set it up, which was quite simple! Happy I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Aquil

customer_reviews.title: WOW!!!!  That was easy!
customer_reviews.text: We've been struggling for months with our situation @ our front door for our business (need a code to enter and no "doorbell" for those not knowing it) I literally took this out of the box, plugged it in and it worked immediately. Installed one receiver in our entrance area and one in our upstairs office area and this works like a charm. Loud enough for everyone to hear. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: L Hood

customer_reviews.title: No comparison to base this off of, but it's probably the best wireless ringer on the market
customer_reviews.text: just in time for christmas, rocking rudolph the red nose reindeer throughout the house. the kids love it, they make sure to ring this at least once daily. got the black version, not an eyesore, it just sort of blends in with the rest of the house. seems durable, comes with everything you need to set it up. Seems easy to replace should the need arise & feels sturdy. hope this keeps selling well so they stay in business - good job with this one SadoTech.
customer_reviews.author: AlexInMaine

customer_reviews.title: The SadoTech wireless doorbell system works great, and the price is right!
customer_reviews.text: Works so much better than the Hampton Bay wireless doorbell, that I tried then returned to Home Depot. I never could get it to work once the tmtr and rcvr were 20' apart. The old one I was replacing was undependable. Worked sometimes, but not others. The SadoTech wireless system works every time! Plus there is an extra push button, so I have one mounted on the back door, with a different ring tone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and simple
customer_reviews.text: I was considering a "Ring" but read a number of concerning reviews and decided to stick with something simple. This is perfect. Installation is a piece of cake. Great with two remotes that allow different ring sounds. One for the back door and one for the front door. One receiver on the first and another on the second floor so everybody can hear the door bell. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: DerAusgewanderte

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 doors and weren't able to hear when people knocked. About a month ago, I bought the Crosspoint Expandable Wireless Doorbell Alert System and we've been very happy with the system. Since you can set them to play different tunes, we know right away which door the person is at. Yes, it's waterproof. No problems so far and believe me, we've had a LOT of rain.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Argo

customer_reviews.title: Great distance & versatility.
customer_reviews.text: Recently purchased so that the doorbell can be heard not only in our house, but also in the studio apartment behind the house. Since the ringer unit plugs into any outlet, I can easily move it temporarily to our shop, so that I don't miss people (like my Amazon deliveries!) who came to our front door.
customer_reviews.author: H.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Easy to ionstall
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I am hard of hearing but I can hear these. Different volume setting and a lot of different sounds. I would buy them again. 2 different push buttons and you can put different sounds on different doors so you know which door the person is at.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy Installation
customer_reviews.text: A conplete snap to set up. Received two “receivers” that plug in and two doorbells, came with batteries inside. took minutes to install and set up. Embarrassingly, this thing has too many ring tones, and some arent that loud but seems to work well and looks good too.
customer_reviews.author: El Duderino

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect from a wireless doorbell, but I am/was pleasantly surprised. Total setup time was approx. 5 minutes and it works great. I like that it's water-resistant, the selection of ring sounds and volume control so that you don't wake the neighborhood whenever someone rings the doorbell. So far, so good and I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Casey K.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a caregiver or recipient, this is an indispensable product! I know where Dad needs me when it matters most. It is dependable with all the volume you desire. I bought two sets as they are relatable and expandable. We were able to eliminate several unwanted bells and remotes. Simplify your life!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Simple, versatile doorbell solution
customer_reviews.text: This is a simple to install (no wires) and setup doorbell solution. The ability to expand devices sold me. I added at doorbell to a frequently used patio door and assigned a different ringtone. Don't forget to complete the online registration for the warranty extension and free device! (I almost threw out the notice.)
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and works great!!
customer_reviews.text: Very long range and super easy to install. The actual buttons are peel and stick simplicity. Screws are included if you want to have a bit more of a secure install. The double sided tape seems to be of good quality so I used that instead. The main module just plugs into any available power receptacle. This is the second set I've purchased and could not be more pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Rose

customer_reviews.title: Solid Doorbell with great range!
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell has a ton of different ringer choices and the look is A-OK....That being said, the main reason I bought it was for the stated range....We have had issues before with doorbells not transmitting through the outside walls of our older house which are steel siding over top of old asbestos siding over top of 3/4" lap boards.....This doorbell tackles them all like a champ and I was even able to put another receiver out in our disconnected garage! Great doorbell for little $$$$.
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL S.

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: These are removable which I found is a good thing. Bought for our church when we started keeping the doors locked during service so late comers could ring the bell and get someone to open the door. We initially left them up but someone took one off and busted it so we now take them in after service. I ended up buying one for our house also. Very easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: A good value for the cost
customer_reviews.text: This item is as described, although we were confused on the LED feature. We though that, after dark, the ring on the transmitter would glow blue so it could be found. The LED only shines when the transmitter button is pushed We suppose the battery would run down a lot sooner if the transmitter ring glowed all night.
customer_reviews.author: IGP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up and works great.
customer_reviews.text: It might take awhile before friends get use to the idea of me having a doorbell again, it's been so long. That's why I chose black, so it would stand out more on white trim. (Just a tip) This doorbell system is everything the seller said it was. It works great. Christmas music and Happy Birthday? Who'd a thought it?
customer_reviews.author: GunnyGrandad

customer_reviews.title: Wireless doorbell works great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up, easy to program, took 5 min to completely set up 2 doorbells Different volume settings make it easy to hear from anywhere in the house, neat and clean looking and I love the idea that you can plug them in anywhere you need them and they also have many different tunes and bells sounds, They also shipped very fast, received them in 2 days
customer_reviews.author: DeLee

customer_reviews.title: Work well, easy to install
customer_reviews.text: This doorbell and receiver system is super easy to install and works as promised. Because my house entrance is covered, I elected to use the included double sided tape to mount the doorbell to the house instead of screwing into stucco. Both receivers, both plugged and battery operated, required no setup and work flawlessly. I don't really have need for the additional motion sensor - which would be handy if my children were younger or if I had a back gate - but I tested it's connectivity and it works as advertised. The chimes on the receivers are loud and adjustable and I like that I can place them in different parts of my home.
customer_reviews.author: James Levine

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Buy!  They just work!!!
customer_reviews.text: This thing just works...didn't need any other rings but nice to have that option. Easy to install and excellent range. I have mounted on near the garage and one at the front door.. I place one receiver upstairs in the hallway and the other in the foyer.. either button will ring them both without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Uptegrow

customer_reviews.title: works and loud enough for my parents
customer_reviews.text: They are getting hard of hearing. The house chime is in kitchen and they sometimes don't hear the doorbell when in bedroom. This was a perfect solution. I am using it in my house as well. It's been about a year? No problem so far. I also like fairly discreet size of the button unit.
customer_reviews.author: ventingisok

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up wireless door bells
customer_reviews.text: These work well and from one end of the house to the other. I put one button at the south end of my house and one at the north end in the garage area. I ordered 3 ringer units and they are loud enough to hear in the other room. Can not attest to longevity but we are giving them a go.
customer_reviews.author: G. Butler

customer_reviews.title: These exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.text: Our house didnt have wiring for a doorbell so i decided to try these out. WOW they've been working great! Very loud with plenty of volume/sound effect options. We have a brick house and the range has not been an issue. We have one speaker in the kitchen and one up in our bedroom. I would recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: benjamin cooley

product_meta.title: Wireless Doorbell by SadoTech – Waterproof Door Bells & Chimes Wireless Kit, 1000-ft Range,52 Door Bell Chimes, 4 Volume Levels with LED, Wireless Doorbells w/ 2 Receiver & 2 Button, Crosspoint, White
feature_bullets: ★SMART DOORBELL RING CHIME SYSTEM - Multiple door bell receivers can be configured to RING WITH DIFFERENT door chimes or ringtones to let you know which transmitter was triggered. It's smart and very

★UNLIKE IMITATION door chimes for home THAT STOP WORKING after months or even days, the SadoTech Door Chime is the real deal. Featured on QVC, FOX, ABC, NBC & CBS News, our PATENTED DESIGN uses only the HIGHEST QUALITY microchips & electronics for LONG RANGE WIRELESS & even LONGER BATTERY LIFE. Avoid the disappointment & frustration of other doorbell chimes & enjoy the FLEXIBILITY our doorbell button creates. "It's built well, and it has a nice minimalist style" - Business Insider.

★PAIRS & CONNECTS EASILY FOR quick, frustration-free installation anywhere in your home. WHILE OTHER doorbells wireless are DIFFICULT TO SET UP or DON’T WORK CONSISTENTLY, door bells by SadoTech extend OVER 1000FT of RANGE in open areas & are PROVEN TO WORK THROUGH DOORS & WALLS. Great for large homes, apartments, offices & warehouses. And with BATTERY LIFE of UP TO 3 YEARS, you’ll never miss a chime! Use as door chime for business when entering or classroom doorbell for teachers!

★THIS WIRELESS DOORBELL KIT IS the perfect starter for any wireless door bell user. KIT CONTAINS: 2 wireless doorbell transmitters and 2 plug in smart doorbell receiver, double sided mounting tape, anchors, screws and A23 BATTERY INCLUDED. Sleek, modern LED INDICATOR lights illuminate both transmitter & receiver & can be set at 4 VOLUME SETTINGS, from low for naptime to high during a party. Our extensive COLOR SELECTION means you’ll find the right door bell push button to suit your style.

★BUILD THE ULTIMATE SMART door bell system – With multiple wireless door bells you can CONFIGURE each door with A DIFFERENT CHIME or ringtone. KNOW EXACTLY WHICH DOOR your visitors are calling from. For homes or offices with multiple entry points, this is CONVENIENT & TIME-SAVING. You’ll soon wonder how you lived without it. And UNLIKE SOME OTHER doorbell wireless, this door bell by SadoTech is truly WATERPROOF & WEATHERPROOF to -4°F/140°F for a system that lasts for years to come.

★OUR PATENT-PENDING SOUND CHIP holds the LARGEST SELECTION of classy, high-quality ding-dong chimes, NO “TINNY”, ANNOYING ringtones. With 52 TOTAL RINGTONES at 4 VOLUME LEVELS, you’ll feel good knowing our ring chime MEMORY CHIP STORES your chosen doorbell chime selections even when unplugged or turned off. LISTEN FOR YOURSELF! Just SCROLL DOWN to the Technical Specs section below & click the Specification Sheet link to DOWNLOAD the PDF. Open the PDF and play all 52 ringtones.

★AT SADOTECH, OUR GOAL IS to provide INNOVATIVE, HIGH-QUALITY PRODUCTS at a price everyone can afford. QUALITY IS KEY! We love that our products bring ADDED SECURITY, CONTROL & peace of mind to you, our customers. NEED SPARE BATTERIES, extra add-on buttons, receivers, sensors or a CUSTOMIZED DOORBELL button? Visit our store ➔ www.amazon.com/sadotech. If, for any reason, you don’t love your wireless doorbells by SadoTech, reach out and WE WILL MAKE IT RIGHT.
